projects

Over the years I’ve built or contributed to quite a few things. These are just a select few of them.

Rust libraries

Valve
rust
r
production
valve creates multi-threaded Plumber APIs powered by Rust’s tokio and axum web frameworks. Plumber connections are automatically spawned, pooled, and terminated using deadpool…
arrow_extendr
rust
r
arrow-extendr is a crate that facilitates the transfer of Apache Arrow memory between R and Rust. It utilizes extendr, the {nanoarrow} R package, and arrow-rs.
serde_esri
rust
spatial
serde_esri provides struct definitions to represent Esri JSON objects with serde::Deserialize and serde::Serialize trait implementations.
sfconversions
rust
r
spatial
A minimal Rust library to convert geometry objects from the R package {sf} into geo-types geometry primitives using extendr.
No matching items

Packages & contributions

R package system requirements
package
r
The goal of sysreqs is to make it easy to identify R package system dependencies. There are two components to this package: an “API” and a wrapper package.

music
genius was my first R package and my first digital child. genius provided a way to programatically access song lyrics from genius.com. This included ways to fetch single…
h3o for H3 indexing
rust
r
spatial
package

rsgeo (deprecated)
rust
spatial
r
rsgeo is an interface to the Rust libraries geo-types and geo. geo-types implements pure rust geometry primitives. The geo library adds additional algorithm functionalities…

r

Urban Informatics Toolkit

The Urban Informatics Toolkit (uitk) is an open text book I wrote with the intention of teaching first year graduate students in Urban Informatics the R programming language.
